EmailTemplate.subject: Replay our peering automation and DDoS mitigation livestream
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Take control of your peering edge If you missed our Networking Field Day livestream on Deepfield network analytics, express peering and DDoS mitigation, catch up now <[[http://pf.content.nokia.com/nfd20/?lb_email={{lead.Email Address}}&did=d000000001dh&utm_campaign=peering_engineering&utm_source=email-list-marketo_nfd20&utm_medium=email&utm_content=post_event]]> on demand. See how our technical experts addressed peering issues such as network latency, performance and security, and watch live demos of our network analytics, peering engineering and DDoS mitigation solutions. Â© {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia.
Nokia: Karaportti 3, 2610 Espoo, Finland Contact Us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Twitter}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Linkedin}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Facebook}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Youtube}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Blog}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia Networks or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
